  • Constructor Details

    • TableImpl

      public TableImpl()
      This constructor put the attributes with default values

    • TableImpl

      public TableImpl​(CardImpl[] deckOfCards, PlayerImpl[] players, CardImpl[] cardsOfTable)
      This constructor put the attributes with the values passed by parameter. If length of deckOfCards isn't 52, the constructor builds a array with defaults objects. If length of players isn't 5, the constructor builds a array with defaults objects. If length of cardsOfTable isn't 5, the constructor builds a array with defaults objects.
      Parameters:
      deckOfCards - array of letters
      players - array of players
      cardsOfTable - array of letters

    • TableImpl

      public TableImpl​(CardImpl[] deskOfCards, PlayerImpl[] players, CardImpl[] cardsOfTable, int[][] betsPlayers, boolean[] playerActive, boolean[] playerAllInLower)
      This constructor put the attributes with the values passed by parameter. If length of deskOfCards isn't 52, the constructor builds a array with defaults objects. If length of players isn't 5, the constructor builds a array with defaults objects. If length of cardsOfTable isn't 5, the constructor builds a array with defaults objects. If length of betsPlayers isn't 5 times 5, the constructor builds a array with defaults values. If length of playerActive isn't 5, the constructor builds a array with false. If length of playerAllInLower isn't 5, the constructor builds a array with false.
      Parameters:
      deskOfCards - array of letters
      players - array of players
      cardsOfTable - array of letters
      betsPlayers - array of int
      playerActive - array of boolean
      playerAllInLower - array of boolean

    • TableImpl

      public TableImpl​(TableImpl other)
      This constructor put the attributes with the values of the other object passed by parameter
      Parameters:
      other - another table of we want to copy their values

    • getCardOfDeskOfCards

      public CardImpl getCardOfDeskOfCards​(int indexDeskOfCards)
      Return the card of the index in the array "deckOfCards". The allowed range of the index is 0 to 51.
      Parameters:
      indexDeskOfCards - index of the card of you will want return
      Returns:
      CartaImpl card that you want to get if the value of index passed by parameter is allowed. If the value of index not allowed, return a card with value 0 and 0

      Returns:

    • getPlayer

      public PlayerImpl getPlayer​(int index)
      This method return the player of the position passed by parameter. The allowed range of the index is 0 to 4.
      Parameters:
      index - position of the player you want to get
      Returns:
      PlayerImpl player yo want to get. If the index not between of range allowed return a player with value "IndexOvertakeRange" in "username".

      player - player you want to add
      Returns:
      Return true if the value of the array index player passed by parameter has been changed. Return false if the value of the array index player passed by parameter hasn't been changed.
